column4: hi.. in /home i found hidden folder named " Trash-0 " what is actually this folder? there's some gb of files inside.
its where stuff goes when you move to trash, probably
though tht seems like the old way of doing it... trash moved a few releases ago. .Trash-0 should only be for removable drives now
: i delete that folder and get about 13 gb. are you sure it won't affecting my system?
yes, its everything you moved to trash and then never emptied
unless you go around renaming folders of things you want to be ".Trash-0"
in which case...interesting way of organizing your files!
: ok thank you
no, whatever version it was shipped with, it keeps
with exception of bug fix and security updates
2.28 is in karmic
thank you for the info :-)
what's the different? qt is kde.
quassel was originally made not to use any kde libraries, only the qt toolkit
now it has compile-time options whether it uses kde libraries and kde widgets for certain things
kde is an extension of qt
in lucid, you will be able to choose between installing the kde version or the qt version, but in kamic, it's pure qt
yeah i can't wait to try kubuntu LTS. i hope they fix the problem with plasma-desktop.
which would that be?
plasma-desktop won't run on startup i always have to run it manually.
uh thats odd. i dont have that problem
